Literature.Title: Designed antimicrobial and antitumor peptides with high selectivity.
Literature.Author: Hu J, Chen C, Zhang S, Zhao X, Xu H, Zhao X, Lu JR

Literature.Title: High Therapeutic Index α-Helical AMPs and Their Therapeutic Potential on Bacterial Lung and Skin Wound Infections.
Literature.Author: Ouyang X, Li B, Yang T, Yang Y, Ba Z, Zhang J, Yang P, Liu Y, Wang Y, Zhao Y, Mao W, Wu X, Zeng X, Zhong C, Liu H, Zhang Y, Gou S, Ni J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=41±2 µM,Mouse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=6.887 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:IC50=6.92 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=2±0.5µM),Bacillus subtilis 168(MIC=0.5±0.1µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=4±2.3µM),Human promyelocytic leukemia HL-60(IC50=10±2.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=2µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=4µM)
